cookie_policy_intro: This website belongs to and is managed by Bankimonline Ltd. ("Bankimonline"). Bankimonline may update this notice at any time and publish changes on this page. You should visit this page periodically to review these updates.
cookie_policy_what_are_text:
Cookie files are small text files stored on your device (computer, mobile phone, or any other device) when you visit websites. Cookies store information about your visit to the site and help us remember your preferences and improve your browsing experience.

Cookies are not harmful to your device and do not contain viruses. They serve various purposes such as remembering login details, saving items in shopping carts, displaying relevant advertisements, and analyzing website traffic.
cookie_policy_essential_text:
These cookies are essential for the proper functioning of the website. Without these cookies, some services on the site will not work properly. Essential cookies include:

• Security and user identification cookies
• Session cookies for site navigation
• Cookies for saving basic preferences

Duration: Session cookies (deleted when browser is closed) or up to 12 months
Legal basis: Legitimate interest - essential for website functionality
cookie_policy_functional_text:
These cookies allow the website to remember choices you have made and provide enhanced and more personalized features:

• Remembering your preferred website language
• Remembering display settings
• Saving information in mortgage calculators

Duration: Up to 24 months
Legal basis: Consent
cookie_policy_analytics_text:
These cookies help us understand how visitors use the website by collecting information anonymously:

• Counting visitors and traffic sources
• Identifying the most popular pages
• Analyzing browsing patterns to improve the site

Providers: Google Analytics, Hotjar, Facebook Pixel
Duration: Up to 26 months
Legal basis: Consent
cookie_policy_marketing_text:
These cookies are used to display relevant advertisements to you and measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns:

• Displaying personalized advertisements
• Preventing the same advertisement from being shown multiple times
• Measuring advertising effectiveness

Providers: Google Ads, Facebook, LinkedIn, other advertising companies
Duration: Up to 24 months
Legal basis: Consent
cookie_policy_consent_text:
In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and electronic privacy laws, we are required to obtain your explicit consent for the use of non-essential cookies.

Valid consent must be:
• Given freely without pressure
• Specific to each type of cookie
• Based on complete and understandable information
• Easily revocable

You can give consent using the selection buttons in the cookie banner that appears on your first visit to the site.
cookie_policy_personal_data_text:
Some cookies may collect data that identifies you personally or in combination with other information. This data includes:

• Unique device identifier
• IP address
• Browsing patterns and site behavior
• General geographic information

Your rights under GDPR:
• Right to access your personal information
• Right to correct incorrect data
• Right to data deletion (right to be forgotten)
• Right to restrict processing
• Right to data portability
• Right to object to processing
cookie_policy_sharing_text:
We may share information with external service providers for the following purposes:

• Website traffic analysis (Google Analytics)
• Targeted advertising (Google Ads, Facebook)
• User experience improvement (Hotjar)
• Payment and security services

Each external provider is obligated to:
• Meet high data security standards
• Use information only for defined purposes
• Delete information when no longer needed
cookie_policy_management_text:
You can manage your cookie preferences in several ways:

Through our website settings:
• Click on "Cookie Settings" at the bottom of the page
• Choose the types of cookies you wish to approve
• Save your settings

Through your browser settings:
Chrome: Click three dots (⋮) → Settings → Privacy and security → Cookies
Firefox: Click three lines (☰) → Settings → Privacy and security
Safari: Safari menu → Preferences → Privacy
Edge: Three dots (...) → Settings → Privacy, search and services
cookie_policy_mobile_text:
In mobile applications or when browsing on mobile devices, you can manage tracking settings:

iOS (iPhone/iPad):
Settings → Privacy & Security → Tracking → App Tracking Requests

Android:
Settings → Google → Ads → Reset advertising ID
cookie_policy_logging_text:
We keep a record of the consents you have given for 12 months from your last visit to the site, as required by law. The record includes:

• Date and time of consent
• Types of cookies you approved
• Version of cookie policy that was in effect
• IP address (encrypted)
cookie_policy_updates_text:
We continuously monitor the cookies active on our website and update this policy accordingly. Material changes will require renewed consent.

Last update: July 2025
Version: 2.1
cookie_policy_contact_text:
For questions regarding the cookie policy or requests related to your personal data:

Email: privacy@banktlmonline.com
Phone: 03-1234567
Address: Bankers Street 15, Tel Aviv 6812345
Data Protection Officer (DPO): dpo@bankimonline.com

For requests to delete data, corrections, or to receive a copy of the information we hold about you, please contact us using the above methods. We will respond to your inquiry within 30 days.
